```py
>>> raw_cat = pd.Categorical(['a', 'b', 'c', 'a'], ordered=True)
>>> ser = pd.Series(raw_cat)
>>> ser.cat.ordered
True
>>> ser = ser.cat.as_unordered()
>>> ser.cat.ordered
False 
```

```py
>>> ci = pd.CategoricalIndex(['a', 'b', 'c', 'a'], ordered=True)
>>> ci.ordered
True
>>> ci = ci.as_unordered()
>>> ci.ordered
False 
```
